encrypt

public static byte[] encrypt(byte[] data,
                             byte[] publicKey)
encrypt a byte array with a public key using ECIES. After the algorithm published in 'Guide to elliptic curve encryption' (Hankerson, Menezes, Vanstone) Page 189ff

Parameters:
data -
publicKey -
Returns:
byte array with crypted triple (R,C,t)

decrypt

public static byte[] decrypt(byte[] data,
                             AsymmetricCipherKeyPair pair)
                      throws InvalidCipherTextException
decrypt a byte array with a public key using ECIES. After the algorithm published in 'Guide to elliptic curve encryption' (Hankerson, Menezes, Vanstone) Page 190ff

Parameters:
data - the encrypted data
pair - the keypair of the receiver
Returns:
byte[] the decoded data
Throws:
InvalidCipherTextException
